function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Little attention to the quality of green spaces may affect the benefits to people","Impact":"Reduced life satisfaction, mental restoration, and stress recovery for individuals","Mitigation":"Implement green space quality standards and monitoring, promote public awareness of the benefits of high-quality green spaces","Technologies":"Green space monitoring technology, public education campaigns","People":"General public, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Degradation and fragmentation of natural habitats in urban areas","Impact":"Loss of habitat and potential extinction of wild animal populations","Mitigation":"Implement urban wildlife habitat restoration projects, create wildlife corridors in urban areas, reduce fragmentation of green spaces","Technologies":"Habitat restoration technology, ecological connectivity planning tools","People":"Wildlife populations, urban planners, environmental agencies","Owner":"Environmental agencies, urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Exposure to pollutants and parasites transmission in urban areas","Impact":"Health risks to urban wildlife and potential spread of disease to human populations","Mitigation":"Implement pollution control measures, conduct regular health monitoring of urban wildlife, promote public awareness of disease transmission risks","Technologies":"Pollution control technology, wildlife health monitoring tools, public education campaigns","People":"Urban wildlife, human populations, environmental agencies","Owner":"Environmental agencies, public health organizations"}]}
